Posts.Content: I will be thinking of you ,I have to wait a while longer for mine .just think tomorrow is the start of your recovery ,keep strong take something to help you sleep tonight as you need to be the best you can ,you will get through this xx
Posts.Title: Really scared

Posts.Content: I would love a bosom buddy ....just starting my journey if there is anyone out there in the same position, in manchester x
Posts.Title: Could I suggest buddy system? You could have a bosom buddy too :-...

Posts.Content: I felt exactly the same ,it's all so scarey ,I have found it easier by just talking which my friends say I'm good at lol x I have just had a mastectomy and am now waiting to hear what happens next? I wish you lots of luck x just keep well rested ,drink lots of water as it really is good for you and try to keep surrounded by friends or family as it helps to be distracted when you can .message me if you need someone to have a moan at or for whatever xx
Posts.Title: I feel Shellshocked.

Posts.Content: I recently had mine and am feeling just the same ,so am hoping I am normal as well,mine was hurting because of an infection.i am also struggling but I think it's because of the pain I know I haven't done enough exercise on it,it's hard when it hurts. I wish some days I knew someone local I could talk to who was in the same boat because I feel no one knows how I feel xx
Posts.Title: Discomfort and general low feeling after mastectomy

Posts.Content: I had mine on 19th June and am feeling just the same ,so am hoping I am normal as well,mine was hurting because of an infection.i am also struggling but I think it's because of the pain I know I haven't done enough exercise on it,it's hard when it hurts. I wish some days I knew someone local I could talk to who was in the same boat because I feel no one knows how I feel xx
Posts.Title: Discomfort and general low feeling after mastectomy

Posts.Content: Sorry not good on here only thought I had posted one reply lol x I am in the manchester area if anyone is around here to chat to x
Posts.Title: Discomfort and general low feeling after mastectomy

Posts.Content: Hi I had an immediate reconstruction with expander, I have not had it filled yet as waiting to finish chemo.i am getting used to them slowly now all the swelling from mastectomy gone .i still have to wear a softee in my bra but have managed t sleep on my side this week ..bliss lol x
Posts.Title: Expander Implant advice please

Posts.Content: Misty motley thanks for the reply it's temporary,I will bear in mind when they start filling , I think i just want it all over and done lol x but in this case less is not more lol it's less pain x

Posts.Content: I had my mastectomy with expander 19th June ,just getting over an infection just wondering when they start expanding and is it painful, thank you
